website_summaries.verdict: Boasting all-natural ingredients, this powder detergent gets the job done without the use of any harsh chemicals.
pros: This powder detergent comes in a neat metal tin that is recyclable
Powder does not leave any residue after a wash. Makes clothes smell fresh and clean
Dissolves well, even in cold water
cons: It takes more than a tablespoon of detergent for large or particularly dirty loads

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Tried Nellie's detergent on a full load of towels and washcloths. I then used the dryer balls. Compared to the detergent I used previously, the towels felt appreciably more rough. I then washed a loaded of cotton shirts. Colors came out duller and somewhat faded. Given the reviews of this product, I am disappointed. I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Lindenbaum

customer_reviews.title: This product has kept my diapers looking great!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for almost 5 years now. With three babies. I have used the same cloth diapers for that 5 years. This product has kept my diapers looking great!
customer_reviews.author: Megan West

customer_reviews.title: Ruined clothes
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Faded an entire load of clothes so badly they looked like they were 30 years old. Took the graphics right off t-shirts. It also made denim feel rough and worn out. Highly disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth D

customer_reviews.title: Cloth diapering win!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a cloth diapering mama, and this is what I primarily use. I love it, so let me just rave about it and tell you why: 1) It cleans the diapers really well. I haven't had smell issues (hallelujah). 2) It's one of the approved detergents, and with good reason. It's been really gentle on the fabric. (Also great, gotta make the investment in bumgenius and fuzzybuns last!) 3)It lasts FOREVER! Seriously, just one container lasted about a year for me.
customer_reviews.author: SJDecker

customer_reviews.title: Best detergent ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent so much! I used to only be able to find it at the MN State Fair, so I only bought it once a year. But I could usually get it to last me that long. However, I only do 2-3 loads of laundry a week. I have really sensitive skin and any fragrance and most big brand detergents really irritate my skin. This does not irritate my skin and makes my clothes feel clean and soft! Although it doesn’t have a scent, it makes the clothes smell clean (with out the “clean” scent added to it!). You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Callahan Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Works but tehre may be differences between the ouch and tin packaging
customer_reviews.text: Initially i ordered the small pouch for 30 loads. Liked that one, so ordered the big can. After several weeks of washes, my comments are as follows (note that I hadnt seen these effects with the original pouch I had bought so maybe the 2 sizes have differences in content). Pros: Clothes appear to be clean after washing Little or no residue seems to be left after washing Cons: Clothes get a 'harsh' texture. Cottons in particular turned quite coarse and scraped sensitive skin areas All in all, its good there are almost no residues, but the texture of clothing seems to be quite messed up after washing!
customer_reviews.author: Durrell fan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do anything
customer_reviews.text: I may be doing something wrong, but I have not noticed any effects of this product. The whites aren't whiter, and colors aren't brighter. And I confirmed that I am following the instructions on the box. The only "bright side" of this product is that the tin can looks kinda vintage, which is cool. But then again, at around $19, this is a darn expensive tin can...
customer_reviews.author: Orie Z.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Nellie's for several years and have been very happy. Late last year I ran out of Nellie's and on a whim decided to try Charlie's. Big mistake. Nellie's got my clothes clean, removed stains and softened clothes naurally. Charlie's gave me a rash, didn't get clothes clean and didn't fully dissolve. I dumped out the Charlie's and went back to Nellie's. My only complaint is when the new can of Nellie's was delivered today it was dented, the bag inside was ripped open and there was a pile of detergent in the bottom of the shipping carton. I gave the product 5 stars but the shipping was 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazon often loses measure!!
customer_reviews.text: The product is great! Save the little blue measuring cup before next order arrives. Sometimes Amazon loses the measuring cup. When my last order arrived, the lid for the can was wedged beside a larger box in shipping box. There is no way, in my opinion that shipping could have dislodged the lid and placed it where I found it. As there is a twist tie on the upright can, the powder was intact. There was NO blue measuring cup inside the box. This is not the first time this has been an issue with Amazon. I will continue to order this excellent product. I will continue to save the blue measuring cup should Amazon again lose it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Boettcher

customer_reviews.title: Took out red wine in a single wash
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this powder because I’m looking to avoid single-use plastics and unecessary water waste that comes with a liquid detergent. My husband was extremely apprehensive because we’ve had green cleaning products that didn’t work before. Well, it got red wine puke out of a cotton bedding without any additional treatment in one wash. 😦 I expected the bedding to be ruined and was planning on throwing it away. We’ll be customers for life.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t wash out BO; scratchy clothes
customer_reviews.text: I liked this at first, but like some of the other reviewers, after a while I noticed that my clothes felt stiff and more scratchy after washing with this soap. Then I noticed that it doesn’t do a good job of washing out underarm body odor at all. :( I’m back to buying regular unscented laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Not good for stains.
customer_reviews.text: Clothes smell clean but stains don't come out. Was using a pre-treater on everything and had to examine all clothes before tossing into the hamper. Had to rewash plenty of clothes before I got fed up and switched to a typical detergent.
customer_reviews.author: LuvToRead

customer_reviews.title: I love that it doesn't have any scent but gives clothes ...
customer_reviews.text: Will never go back to liquid detergent again. Towels always smell moldy for some reason even fresh out the wash. Started using nellies with some white vinegar in the softener compartment and my towels smell so fresh now. I love that it doesn't have any scent but gives clothes a clean feel of their own. I still put some dish detergent or oxyclean on oil stains but for general laundering this is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Best detergent for cloth diapers, hands down!
customer_reviews.text: After 3 types of detergent and 11 months of cloth diapering, I am completely SOLD on this stuff! I only have to use 1 scoop in my washer when washing my cloth diapers and everything comes out SO clean, hardly any stains, and smelling fresh! I am SO impressed. Bum Genius detergent made my diapers smell like wet dog. Charlie's Soap didn't seem to be as effective, and left light blue spots all over my pink clothes! It also lasts a long time! I wash diapers on average every other day, and this stuff lasts about 3-4 months! In a nutshell: BUY IT.
customer_reviews.author: MaKenna

customer_reviews.title: No added dyes & removes smells
customer_reviews.text: I use this product because I don’t like added dyes and ingredients in the mainstream laundry detergents. My husband and I use this on everything- but it is especially good on athletic clothes. It removes all hard to get sweat smells! It is also easy on formal clothes. This cleans great but there is no scent added into the detergent, which I don’t mind since it still comes out clean- but if you’re used to the “clean detergent smell” than you may have to used to not smelling anything or use a stronger smelling dryer sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Mabry

customer_reviews.title: amazed at how well this cleans
customer_reviews.text: I was absolutely , amazed at how well this cleans, I have zenoestrogen positioning form all the chemicals they put in house hold cleaning products, shampoos , make up, body lotion, this is going to be a big help the sheets felt wonderful against my skin. I bought the 100% wool balls for the dryer! Big difference! It's never too late to change and make a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Mega Deeds

customer_reviews.title: one tin lasts 9 months
customer_reviews.text: I posted another review several months ago. I'm just writing this update to inform everyone that one tin of this marvelous laundry soda last me NINE MONTHS. I used the Nellie's Oxygen Brightener in addition to this soda for each load. I have a family of four, wash full loads of laundry in a full-size HE front loading washing machine (manufactured by LG seven years ago), and I wash around 5-6 loads per week. Some of this laundry is very heavy-duty and heavy-dirt for a construction superintendent, with mud, grease, and paint caked into the clothing. This laundry soda truly performs as well as or better than traditional commercial liquid and powder detergents, and last much, much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Grey

customer_reviews.title: Clothes still stink
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. If you use the recommended amount, your clothes come out still faintly smelling dirty. If you use double, it gets the smell out but can leave residue on darker clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: A better laundry product for one's health
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb product that achieves cleaning while not using phosphates that other brands may use. Phosphates may cause hormonal imbalances in men with an artificial form of estrogen created in the body by the phosphate. I am a man who is purposefully trying to reduce artificial estrogen being created in my body for health reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little bit goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Cute packaging, light, clean scent. Cleans my cloth diapers excellent and I also use it to clean my washer on a sanitary cycle. Only a tbsp needed to do an entire load. No rashes, no lingering scent, gets rid of staining too. I dont see it leaving any residue, but when I strip my diapers at the end of the month I'll check for suds.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Have it on Subscribe and Save!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Nellie’s for 4.5 years. Love it! Deeply cleans our clothes in any water temperature and any type of washer. Though unscented, it really leaves our clothes smelling FRESH. Don’t let the powder form fool you. It’s a soda, not a detergent powder! Dissolves beautifully and softens water for a greater clean. Get It ! use It! Thank you Nellie’s for making such a great product. Love the Tin Packaging. I reuse tins for storage and crafts.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: This is great, unscented, wonderful with colors/any temp water
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this Laundry Detergent!!! As a nurse, I am washing my cloth mask covers that go over my N95 by hand... and the smell of any other detergent seems to become overwhelming! I change my mask anytime anyone coughs or sneezes within a few feet of me. I take a bag full of cloth masks to try and keep my N95 cleaner (as these are limited). Great detergent. One less thing to worry about!
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Love the tin!  Lose the plastic bag.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for a month and I LOVE it so far! Works well for sensitive skin, great cleaning power, LOVE the cute retro tin (and plan to reuse it). Only thing I didn't like - powder is in a plastic bag within the tin, and I was trying to go plastic-free with this.
customer_reviews.author: Ekoostikhebrew

customer_reviews.title: Love this Laundry Detergent
customer_reviews.text: I have used Nellie's for several years now in my HE washer and love it. It is scent less, which is nice is you are sensitive. I do miss the "smell" of clean laundry sometimes, but am always pleased to know that the lack of smell means a reduced amount of chemical exposure from my detergent. Our clothes always feel clean and fresh, just without the detergent scent. It really does seem to last for the full 100 loads or more. Since most of my local merchants do not carry Nellie's, I always buy from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: ABB 2007

customer_reviews.title: no cleaning power
customer_reviews.text: almost no cleaning power. bought this for my cloth diapers and it leaves them stained. won't be repurchasing and don't recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Fresh, natural, crystal clean clothes.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like fragrance in my laundry products, so Nellie's is just perfect for me. My family all have sensitive skin and noses, and this detergent gets our clothing beautifully clean without perfume and residue. The best thing about it is how economical it turns out to be. One small scoop that is enclosed gets a full sized load clean. This container actually does do 100 loads!
customer_reviews.author: HazelBlueJays

customer_reviews.title: Love this detergent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried countless laundry detergents, from Tide to Mrs Meyers and everything in between and this is by far the best laundry detergent for your money. I wash all my clothes in cold water even my whites and this gets them clean, keeps the whites white. I also have an older dachshund and I use washable potty pads for him and this detergent has been the only thing that I've found to clean them well enough that there is no odor without having to use bleach. I high recommend Nellie's.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Unsworth

customer_reviews.title: Try it.  You'll see and feel the difference after the first wash!
customer_reviews.text: I remember my MOTHER using laundry SODA. Wasn't sure what all the fuss was about but NOW I KNOW. First load was towels and I was kind of shocked to see actual SCUM on top of the water! I realized it was residue from other regular laundry detergents. Now my towels and everything else I have washed in it feel so SILKY and CLEAN! Who needs smell and perfumes when what you really want is CLEAN?
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Burch

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t clean effectively
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product, it is all natural and I wanted to get away from using toxic additives in my detergent, but even though I added vinegar to the rinse cycle when using this detergent, our clothes started to retain odor over time. I just wanted too long or I definitely would have returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Coy

customer_reviews.title: Cute but tin arrived damaged 😡
customer_reviews.text: This COULD be the best thing on earth BUT the tin of detergent arrived in a box just a little larger than the tin itself with absolutely no protection. The tin arrived damaged and bent in several places, so it looks terrible, beat up, and ugly all banged up sitting in my laundry room 😡 The tin is cute, but it looks like it's been thrown around many times. The whole idea is to reuse the tin and not have to deal with a plastic container that needs to be recycled. I'm very disappointed that whoever (maybe a robot) packaged the tin and obviously didn't care!!!!' Where is quality control ??? !!!
customer_reviews.author: I Love Hearts

customer_reviews.title: Good for the value
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product is non toxic, affordable, and it does the job. Lasts a very long time, maybe even more than 100 loads. However, it leave a stiff feeling on clothes and gives them a rough texture. I just add an extra rinse cycle or two when washing to solve that problem. It also fades certain clothes of different colors, leaving pale yellow spots and I’m not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!!  Sold!!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product!! My clothes and towels feel softer and you only literally use 1 Tablespoon for a load of laundry & there’s 100 scoops!! I also really love the canister!! Loved this product & bought another for my mom! I put a few scoops in a plastic bag with a tablespoon and use that for doing my laundry...SO much easier too than those bulky bottles!! Love Love Love!!
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Great natural product
customer_reviews.text: Was excited yet nervous to switch to this. Glad I found a natural laundry product that was vegan & not tested on animals. The big name brand stuff is full of toxic chemicals and heavy artificial fragrances. What’s nice about this is it cleans without all of that. I admit that I do miss a fragrance, but hey at least if your clothes still smell after one wash with this, you know that they need to be washed again, vs artificial fragrance masking it. My clothes feel genuinely clean without a film.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Switched everything to Nellie's, never looking back!
customer_reviews.text: Love what this company is all about. Love their products. Made the switch to using all their products for our laundry needs, and I couldn't be more pleased! Clothes come out feeling and smelling (but without really smelling, cause we hate scents) so clean and fresh! Little goes a long way, to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Malissa Parker

customer_reviews.title: Works surprisingly well
customer_reviews.text: When I first looked at this product, I was dubious that it would clean alone (without the addition of a laundry detergent). It looks more like something that supports detergent. But I finally went with it and it works. Clothes come out clean smelling, even my dogs washable pee pads which are tricky. Will be my new detergent as I have been looking for a less plastic packaging, more concentrated laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Danita Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Wasteful- soap in plastic bag w/in aluminum bin, Why?
customer_reviews.text: Specifically bought this hoping I’d avoid buying more plastic waste, then I open the tin box and find the detergent is in a large plastic bag. Sustainable? No. Vegan and nontoxic? Well, unnecessary plastic packaging and the plastic scoop is highly toxic to earth, so.... not really. I’m disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anti-Chris

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE, THIS STUFF!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and Eczema. I have used Charlies Soap for years but I am not seeing the same results with these new high tech fabrics. Don't let the Old Fashioned Container fool you, Nellie's is the real deal. You only need a tablespoon to do the job, there is no heavy fragrance lingering for days (sorry ladies you will have to find another way to mark your men), and it works to clean my carpets, my dishwasher, and my car! This is a wonderful and convenient product, Thanks Nellie's!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Flora

customer_reviews.title: Nellie’s customers for life!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin and cannot have any scents on my skin, since I started using Nellie’s I haven’t had any issues. It’s also packaged in these fantastic aluminum/steel cans, I reuse them for mailing packages and organizing things around the house. We have a big family and constantly do laundry. The color and quality of our clothing/bedding has only improved since using Nellie’s and the clothes always come out sparkling clean.
customer_reviews.author: K. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for washing workout clothes
customer_reviews.text: We have been working diligently to remove all toxic products from our home and laundry detergent was one of our last changes only because we had a bulk size laundry detergent that wouldn't finish. Since making the switch, we've noticed that this laundry detergent cleans our workout clothes better than anything we've ever used before. Our clothes have never been cleaner! And we feel confident using this on both baby's clothes and toddler because it is so gentle.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it will
customer_reviews.text: No bs about it, this cleans with a crazy small dose and thats it, being a good thing. Who needs the extra frills when you just want clean clothes. Gave 0 for smell because there is no smell, again being a good thing. The tin box it comes in is also a wonderful idea to help keep moisture in the air from ruining the powder.
customer_reviews.author: SomeGuy

customer_reviews.title: Eco-friendly with no residue! 5/5
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to switch to a more eco-friendly option and something that won't irritate my sensitive skin. As an added plus, this detergent doesn't have much of a smell either! Nellie's is great for people that are sensitive to smell. It leaves clothes smelling fresh without the chemical stink. I love this product! Deep cleaning power with no residue like most other brands. The measuring spoon makes it easy to add the detergent to the washer, and it has actual eco-friendly packaging. Between this and my wool dryer balls, my clothes have never been better!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Best detergent I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I can tell a distinct difference in my clothes and skin when I use Nellie's vs almost any other detergent. I'll be using tide or gain and I'll have weird bumps all over my upper arms and my tattoos will be raised and the week I start using Nellie's again my skin will be back to normal. My partner is a server and when we use other detergent his uniforms will have food stains and again, as soon as we switch back to Nellie's his uniforms are pristine. I swear there's some sort of magic in this cute little tin.
customer_reviews.author: L Rohlfing

customer_reviews.title: no synthetic scents, cruelty free, no bulky plastic containers
customer_reviews.text: Love the box but wish there were cheaper refills available in heavy paper bags for example. Gets clothes clean with minimal product and does not appear to fade clothing. I prefer using more natural environmentally safe products that are cruelty free.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H

customer_reviews.title: A keeper
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff. I discovered it a few years ago after looking for something that is natural. I use two of the tablespoons per load, it might be a little more than you actually need but it makes me feel better using a little more. Clothes come out smelling neutral and pretty good if anything! I don't want them smelling like fake perfumy, chemical crap that's in all the other detergents. The metal tin it comes in is nice as well. Thoroughly impressed and I will continue to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Justine

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cloth Diapers and Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: We switched to the All Natural Laundry Soda when we had our first son. We started first using if for our cloth diapers, most other detergents have stabilizers and other additives that are in most cases harmless. However the acidic nature of urine can easily react with those in the wash and create rashes. When we use the laundry soda we have zero problems. Shortly after that we got an HE washer and could no longer use our regular laundry detergent so we switched all our clothes to the laundry soda. It was a great idea. The clothes come out clean and with such a large tin it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Gorsline

customer_reviews.title: Best Alternative to chemical laundry soaps.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this eco friendly soap. Cleans much better than the Charlie soap. Clothes come out clean with no nasty “perfume” odor. Going to try the dryer balls next. I use 2 scoops per load for front loading HE washer. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: MidwestGal

customer_reviews.title: My laundry soap choice now
customer_reviews.text: This laundry soda is the coolest! The tin reminds me of something from my youth. The powder works great. It cleans the laundry and does what it says. One scoop in the he full size washer will clean a full load. Neutral scent. Great for sensitive skin. Didn’t fade or yellow clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy Dojang

customer_reviews.title: i recommend
customer_reviews.text: i love this ! the packaging is super cute and i can use it for something else after i run out of laundry soda. my daughter has very sensitive skin and using this detergent has not had any negative effects kr caused any rashes and it gets our clothes clean !
customer_reviews.author: minniemau5

customer_reviews.title: This is a great discovery!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I'm kinda amazed! I just used Nellie's laundry for the first time and as soon as I reached in the wash machine to transfer the clothes to the dryer I could feel a difference in the softness and light feeling of the laundry. After drying, the clothes feel so soft and light. No odor. I doubt I will return to regular laundry soaps. We sleep on our sheets for hours every night, and wear our laundry all day. So fresh and clean with no chemicals is probably the most important change in daily routine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for my husband and I! But our baby girl got a rash from it every time I washed her clothes in it. Tried in cold, warm, hot water but didn't make a difference for her, still got a rash. But I still use it for my husband and I. Just make sure to wash our baby girls clothes seperate with a different detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Aurelia Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Cleans and removes thrift store smell
customer_reviews.text: This laundry detergent is fantastic. Cleans better than most! No scent which is great and it lasts a really long time. I buy a lot of thrifted clothing and until now I’ve never been able to get that thrift store smell out of my clothes. Will definitely be using this from here in out.
customer_reviews.author: TONI WATERS

customer_reviews.title: Good for the the environment.
customer_reviews.text: I love the packaging & wish I was creative enough to figure out how to reuse the cute tins. Seems to work every bit as good as the one made with chemicals. Must be excellent for sensitive skin. No smell if you like scent free.
customer_reviews.author: Cduck

customer_reviews.title: It get's our clothes nice and clean
customer_reviews.text: This laundry soap has no fragrances, no GMO's, gluten free, biodegradable and safe for our septic tank. It get's our clothes nice and clean. It works in my HE machine, dissolves in both hot and cold water, so it doesn't leave all the residue in our clothes or irritate our skin. It also, comes in a nice tin to keep it in, which is recyclable. Make sure not to use more than a scoop for a full load, I actually use less than it says and still get my clothes clean.
customer_reviews.author: CottonTop

customer_reviews.title: also using large wool dryer balls- and now the laundry is yummy and fluffy and i feel like i am folding hotel laundry
customer_reviews.text: wow. just wow. i have made my own laundry soap for 6 years now and this beats it- hands down. I have been struggling with a slightly off smell in the laundry for years- i keep trying to clean out the machine- but never works. One wash using this soap- and my clothes smell clean- just clean-- no scents- no weird musty odor- just CLEAN!! also using large wool dryer balls- and now the laundry is yummy and fluffy and i feel like i am folding hotel laundry. i will never go back.
customer_reviews.author: ashandjenn

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this product ... there are 4 of us doing laundry and we all like the results of this product. It doesn't matter if it's delicates or heavily soiled work clothes. We were thrilled to find this alternative to chemical-filled products at the local store. We've been using it a year or more and won't be looking to change anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: MzOnPointPromo

customer_reviews.title: Clean clothes and diapers!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for cloth diapering, but then extended it's use to all of my laundry. I am very happy with it. My diapers are clean, and never stink. My laundry is clean, and my sensitive skin doesn't get irritated by it. I do have to admit that it didn't seem to work well for my husbands stinky pits in some of his workout shirts, but then again, neither did other detergents. This also didn't get out breastmilk grease stains on my shirts, but I don't think a regular detergent would do that either. For those I rub some dish soap in and throw them in the wash, that usually gets them out well! Overall, I love Nellies!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonQueen

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable! The best product I have used
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic to most detergents and had such a tough time finding a gentle one that gets clothes clean. I found it! My clothes feel clean and are Rinsed clean. I only need to use the spoon they provide. I am thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comes in a plastic bag
customer_reviews.text: I’ll by my regular gain... in a cardboard box. Was so disappointed to open this container and see the powder in a plastic bag.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I didn't give 5 stars because one shirt of my husbands came out with the armpits still smelling bad, I rewashed it with the next
customer_reviews.text: I have used on a few loads of laundry and overall everything has been clean. I didn't give 5 stars because one shirt of my husbands came out with the armpits still smelling bad, I rewashed it with the next load and it was good. I am going to start adding essential oils though because I like my laundry to smell like something but hate using so many chemicals
customer_reviews.author: Brook Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I love that the clothes feel like clothes again and are ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this soap for almost 4 years now. I will never, ever use anything else unless they stop making this!!! It all started when I decided to try it out on a whim because I found it on sale at Crate and Barrel. It removed BLUEBERRY jelly stains. I didn't have to pre soak, pre treat or anything. I love that the clothes feel like clothes again and are so soft. LOVE the container/packaging. Love that it's less impact to the environment. Really dig the company. I use their other products, too. Winner!
customer_reviews.author: DHaus

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but it delivers on what it says. Clean, fresh and no blue residue. I was going to buy new towels as my current ones were getting scratchy and not soft anymore. I use so much fabric softener and still they were awful. One use of Nellies and they were brought back to life. I was shocked.
customer_reviews.author: GigiM

customer_reviews.title: Clothes so soft and clean!
customer_reviews.text: Such a super improvement over liquid detergent. My clothes are so much cleaner and softer (get the wool dryer balls for really soft clothes), and I don’t miss scented laundry. Works well on my toddler’s stains in combo with the Nellie’s stain stick.
customer_reviews.author: annikajoy

customer_reviews.title: My go to detergent for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin and break out if I’m exposed to normal detergent. I’ve been using this for years and never had any issues! It cleans clothes great and leaves a simple, clean smell that does not reek of chemicals or fake scents. Works well in hot and cold water. You get your bang for your buck with the amount of loads you’re able to go in a single tin.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Kolts

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this laundry detergent! I'm slightly terrible about remembering to move our clothes from the washer to the dryer right away and most laundry detergent leaves your clothes smelling moldy but not this stuff. It smells clean without the chemical smell and doesn't leave any sort of film. Plus I love that the ingredients are safe for everyone in the house!
customer_reviews.author: Liz B

customer_reviews.title: Won't use anything else now!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this, I could see the soap residue being removed from my clothes! After a few washings, my clothes got softer. I love this stuff and have repurchased. I also love the lamby balls for the dryer. No more chemicals on my clothes!
customer_reviews.author: Norma Jeane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this detergent for years and I still love it. I’m sensitive to fragrance and this doesn’t leave much of one at all but keeps my clothes wonderfully clean. Perfect for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel G

customer_reviews.title: Great for eczema or sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: After struggling to find a suitable replacement for detergent after our brand was discontinued Nellie's saved the day. My daughter has extremely sensitive skin and eczema and even free and clear stuff breaks her out but this worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Wow. It really does work.
customer_reviews.text: Just received the order and have done only a few loads - The clothes are clean but what I noticed most of all is that the film on my front loading door from previous detergents is gone, which leads me to believe that the clothes are also cleaner with no residual detergent. 4 stars because I haven't had the chance to see how it removes stains or more ground in dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Laundry Detergent
customer_reviews.text: I love this laundry detergent. I have used it for a few years now. My kids have very sensitive skin and eczema and I prefer powder detergents for my front loading washing machine. This is the best, most gentle one I've found that actually cleans super well. Gentle on clothes but handles my two little boys (mud, dirt, stains) really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: clean and simple
customer_reviews.text: I love how few ingredients are on the list for this product. It gets my clothes clean with no scary artificial fragrances, just a few simple ingredients. And it goes a long way...just a tiny scoop needed for each load.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.D.

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy for those with Allergies
customer_reviews.text: My son is allergic to everything and has eczema, this is the only thing I can use on his laundry that will not aggravate his skin. Thank God!
customer_reviews.author: Buddysmom

customer_reviews.title: CLEAN Living!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It's clean living without the harsh chemicals that not only destroy your clothing but is harmful to your body! This all natural product is simply the best!!!
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy4evah

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Works great... i was looking for something that worked on kids clothes and that has less impact on the planet. I.e plastic.... it still contains a plastic bag and a plastic scoop but it way less than others.
customer_reviews.author: Happytohelp

customer_reviews.title: really cleans and smells fresh
customer_reviews.text: I have been making my own laundry detergent for several years because I wanted to stop using products that harmed the environment. When I saw this on Amazon and read the reviews, I decided to give it a try, save time making detergent. I am very happy with it. I also bought the whitener but have not needed to use it much. My laundry is clean and smells fresh. No perfumes to smell awful after sitting for a while.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hall

customer_reviews.title: A winner in the laundry room!
customer_reviews.text: I have a front loader and was dealing with gunk building up. During research I discovered liquid detergent and fabric softener was the cause. I switched to this detergent, white vinegar in the fabric softener dispenser an wool balls ( in the dryer. My clothes are clean & fresh and my front loader is gunking up anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I only used a few times my clothing actually came out a little bit stiff and not as soft as usual so I went back to what I have been put using previously. A little bit disappointed actually I was hoping for more
customer_reviews.author: Francine

customer_reviews.title: Great Laundry
customer_reviews.text: Really good laundry. It doesn't require a lot of powder for loads eliminating the need to buy those big jugs of liquid detergent that always make it difficult for you to figure out how much laundry to use in hopes that you use more. Clean, VERY SUBTLE scent, which works perfectly well for me as I find Tide and other detergents smelll just overwhelming. In fact we love is so much we bought a massive barrel from Costco that should last us 8 years by our calculations. Highly recommend if you want to get away from those uber-scented, treated detergents
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: I love this for washing my cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: I love this for washing my cloth diapers. Not only does it take care of stains, but it takes out all the smell too. We use both cloth and disposable and sometimes I forget to wash our diapers for a few days...In fact, sometimes the terrible smell in the laundry room is what reminds me to wash them...Anyways, even when the diapers have been sitting for a few days, the diapers come out so clean and NEVER smell!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this in the tin.It takes up little space and does a great job with only one scoop full.I use no softener in the wash or dryer.The dryer balls fluff the clothes without any residue.Stop wasting money on store brands with so many additives that are not needed.
customer_reviews.author: Girlygirl

customer_reviews.title: To let others not to hoard let others provide there family's to ,Thank You Amazon for caring
customer_reviews.text: Want to Thank All of Amazon for all there hardwork and care for all of us cause I know it is difficult for everyone at this time ,but each and everyone of you I'd like to say ,Be Safe and may God Bless each and everyone of you ....Thank You (◍•ᴗ•◍)❤
customer_reviews.author: Ocean Skye

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well without artificial smells
customer_reviews.text: Cleans clothes really well without artificial scents. Also, skin irritation is less when using this detergent
customer_reviews.author: cytosine

customer_reviews.title: buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I tried it for the first time, and after using it all, I had to buy it again because it works cold water. Above all, I like the fact that there is less environmental pollution.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce J.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, Try it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Works great and gets the stains out. Clothes have a fresh and clean feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Randle

customer_reviews.title: WOW!  Amazing clean, soft clothes with this tiny scoop
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give it ten stars. This stuff really works just like it says. Using the scoop included in the canister is the right amount so train yourself to use less and see for yourself how really clean your clothes will be. Since no residue is left in your clothes, they look bright. Also love that there is no static, just fresh clean clothes. I love this and will never go back to traditional detergents.
customer_reviews.author: Mooselady

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Nellie's laundry soda for a month now and I love it! It leaves a lovely fresh laundry scent in my clothes. I add a few drops of lavender essential oil to loads of socks and towels, but it's probably not even necessary. For extra stinky clothes (ie. my boyfriend's sweaty work clothes), I add 1-1/2 spoonfuls. I'm still using way less than most liquid detergents and I'm extremely happy to have made the switch to an environmentally safe and non-toxic detergent. I'll never go back!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Mullins

customer_reviews.title: this stuff just doesn't do the job. I got ...
customer_reviews.text: this stuff just doesn't do the job. I got it because it was cloth diaper safe, but in the end I was having to use three times as much to actually get my diapers clean. NOT worth it. I switched to a mainstream, plant based detergent and can use normal amounts and get my diapers cleaner for half the price
customer_reviews.author: meghan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to use this laundry detergent. I bought it to wash my babies cloth diapers in, and got it early to try on our clothes to see how it did. Much to my surprise, it actually works better than regular detergent. I've also tried many, many natural laundry detergents, and theres always a little bit of a stink in the clothes after a while. Totally not the case with this. Especially with our bjj gi's. I'm really happy with this product and will be buying the bigger case of it next time!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonderfully for clothing, but not for my cloth diapers!
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well for clothes. I bought this laundry soda specifically for cloth diaper washing, and it unfortunately did not work very well. I ended up with VERY smelly diapers, due to build-up. In all fairness, it is possible that this is due to the water hardness in my city. Again, it worked well for washing clothes and I was very happy with it. I am normally very sensitive to heavy, perfumed laundry detergents, so I was very happy with the mild scent of Nellie's Laundry Soda. As a plus, you get a cute little reusable tin!
customer_reviews.author: Cara T.

customer_reviews.title: Makes clothes softer than other natural products!
customer_reviews.text: Used for laundry. I use a combination of Lysol laundry sanitizer and Gain natural softener, and my clothes come out so soft!!! I love the detergent!
customer_reviews.author: dezertgem

customer_reviews.title: Clothes smell clean
customer_reviews.text: I used to dry my sheets outside on a clothes line because they smelled so clean and fresh. This product brings back that fresh, clean smell that I really miss when washing clothes. It's wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Melinda White

customer_reviews.title: Clean with out fake fragrances.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. There's no scent to it. I dislike fragrances and such. With this soap my clothes come clean without the use of artificial materials.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Great laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I have sensitive skin and this detergent never makes me itchy and it gets my clothes clean. I love that it comes in metal instead of plastic!
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Work great, uses plastic packaging
customer_reviews.text: Our household is trying to eliminate the use of plastic. I bought this because it comes in a tin and the other photos don’t show any plastic packaging. It turns out detergent comes in a plastic bag. I hope Nellie’s switches to using quality tape around the top of the tin to seal the detergent inside, there’s really no reason for plastic. Scent is pleasant and on the light side.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to learn about Nellie's detergent - it's environmentally safe and cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Sundari1053

customer_reviews.title: Works works works !
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff! Washed clothes clean and clean smelling ! I threw some very yucky blankets from my kids having flu in the wash testing this product and behold it’s clean 🧼 and smells nice !
customer_reviews.author: Ward Family

customer_reviews.title: No way of knowing if clothes are clean
customer_reviews.text: This product looks good and does an average job of cleaning. There is no fragrance so it’s hard to determine if you laundry is clean or not. With the tablespoon measuring device, there are no instructions as too how much to use depending on load size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t irritate family’s skin. Clothes just smell clean! Not like flowers covering BO smell. Also less weight on my conscious because it won’t harm the environment. Win Win!
customer_reviews.author: DaniiD

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness for this laundry soap!
customer_reviews.text: After years of trying so many different laundry soap, then resorting to making my own, a friend recommended this to me. With 4 boys, a husband that works outside, and we live on a farm, something that actually works is important. But all have sensitive skin. This is equally impressive for my husband's clothes as it is for the baby's. It is a little expensive at first but 1 can lasts us about a month. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: 4 boys and a farm

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for the past two years with no issue. Washes up as well as any other brand in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: T Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Great laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap even better than Tide! My husband works in a factory and comes home smelling like machine oil and this washes his clothes smell free. It’s in a nice small container and you don’t need to use much of it.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIE ESPOSITO

product_meta.title: Nellie's Non-Toxic Vegan Powdered Laundry Detergent, 100 Loads (3.3lbs) Fresh Scent
feature_bullets: Leave clothes feeling soft, fresh and clean without any residue or harsh chemical.
Safe From: SLS, SLES, gluten, phosphates, fragrance and chlorine.

Why Powder: Liquid detergents are made up from at least 50 percent water. At Nellies we do not think selling you water and moving water around the planet is a very good idea. The fact is, more cleaning power can be packed into a smaller space using powder.

HOW TO USE: Use one tablespoon of Nellies Laundry Soda for each regular sized load. Wash according to instructions on garments. Always test on garments that may bleed or fade. Nellies Laundry Soda is safe for front loading HE and standard washing machines.
Ingredients: Sodium Carbonate, Linear Alcohol Ethoxylate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Metasilicate.
